thread.section_title: Hotel 65 - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very pleasant suprise
thread.title_full: Very pleasant suprise - Review of Hotel 65, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Paul M
title: Very pleasant suprise
text:
I booked a double/twin room at Hotel 65 for one night as I was attending a gig at Shepherds Bush Empire. My reason for choosing the hotel was cost as I was on a tight budget. I've stayed in cheap London hotels before so I wasn't expecting much but I was really pleased my choice.
The room was quite large and was exceptionally clean, as was the en-suite. There were also plenty of tea and coffee to drink and the cups were actual real size cups & not the little cups you get in some big chain hotels. This might seem trivial but when I want a cup of tea, I want a proper cup of tea.
There was plenty of toiletries in the bathroom and the shower was amazing!!
The staff were very friendly and helpful.
If I ever go to Shepherds Bush again, I'd definitely stay here.
